content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0160: Luxury New Build Villa Jávea Portichol €1.9M
content.metaDescription: Exclusive 4-bed villa in prestigious Portichol, Jávea. 209m² luxury living, 1110m² plot, 5 bathrooms. Prime Costa Blanca location near Ambolo. €1,915,000
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0160, an extraordinary luxury residence nestled in the exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious addresses. This exceptional new build villa represents the pinnacle of Mediterranean luxury living, where contemporary design meets the breathtaking natural beauty of the Alicante coastline.

Crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana S.L., this magnificent 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom villa spans 209m² of meticulously designed living space on a generous 1,110m² plot. The property's strategic location in the coveted Ambolo vicinity offers residents unparalleled access to some of Spain's most spectacular beaches, while maintaining the privacy and tranquillity that discerning buyers demand. With its seamless blend of modern sophistication and timeless Mediterranean charm, Villa MIR0160 presents an unmatched opportunity to own a piece of paradise on the Costa Blanca.

locationSection.intro:
Portichol - Balcón al Mar represents the epitome of exclusive coastal living in Jávea, situated on elevated terrain that provides stunning panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. This prestigious enclave is renowned for its proximity to the legendary Cala Ambolo, consistently rated among Spain's most beautiful beaches, while maintaining easy access to Jávea's charming historic town centre and world-class amenities.

The location offers the perfect balance of seclusion and connectivity, with pristine natural parks, exclusive beach clubs, and championship golf courses all within easy reach. The area's unique microclimate, protected by the Montgó Natural Park, ensures over 300 days of sunshine annually, making it a year-round paradise for residents and a highly sought-after destination for international property investors.
highlights: Walking distance to the pristine Cala Ambolo beach, voted one of Spain's most beautiful
Elevated position offering panoramic Mediterranean Sea and coastline views
15 minutes to Jávea's historic town centre with authentic Spanish culture and dining
Proximity to Montgó Natural Park for hiking, cycling, and outdoor adventures
Close to exclusive amenities including Jávea Golf Club and luxury marinas

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0160 showcases exceptional architectural design with thoughtful layout maximising both space and natural light throughout its 209m² of luxury living areas. The property features a sophisticated blend of open-plan living spaces and private retreats, with premium finishes and state-of-the-art technology integrated seamlessly throughout.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms including 3 on upper floor and 1 ground floor guest suite
5 luxury bathrooms, all bedrooms featuring en-suite facilities for maximum privacy
Bright open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows maximising natural light
Modern fully-equipped kitchen with premium appliances and contemporary design
Expansive 1,110m² plot providing ample space for pool, gardens, and outdoor entertainment
High-quality construction by established developer Miralbo Urbana S.L.
Energy-efficient design incorporating latest building technologies and standards
Private outdoor spaces designed for al-fresco dining and Mediterranean lifestyle
Premium interior finishes throughout with attention to luxury details
Secure gated community environment ensuring privacy and exclusivity

content.investmentSection:
The Jávea luxury property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, with premium villas in exclusive areas like Portichol commanding strong rental yields of 4-6% annually while appreciating steadily in capital value. International demand for luxury Costa Blanca properties remains exceptionally strong, driven by the region's year-round climate, established infrastructure, and Spain's attractive Golden Visa programme for non-EU investors.

Villa MIR0160's strategic location in one of Jávea's most prestigious areas, combined with its new build status and premium specifications, positions it perfectly for both immediate rental income and long-term capital appreciation. The property's proximity to Ambolo beach and exclusive amenities ensures consistent demand from high-end vacation rental markets, while the limited supply of similar luxury villas in this coveted location supports strong value retention and growth potential.
whyBuySection: Prime location in exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar, one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious addresses
New build construction ensuring modern standards, energy efficiency, and minimal maintenance requirements
Exceptional rental potential with proximity to world-renowned Ambolo beach and luxury amenities
Spacious 1,110m² plot offering privacy, outdoor living space, and potential for pool installation
Strong investment fundamentals with Jávea's proven track record of property value appreciation
Turn-key luxury living with premium finishes and state-of-the-art appliances included
Spain's Golden Visa eligibility for non-EU buyers seeking European residency benefits

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa MIR0160 and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0160 is priced at €1,915,000. Payment terms typically include a reservation deposit, staged payments during construction, and final completion payment. Our team can discuss flexible payment structures to suit your requirements.

faqs.question: What makes the Portichol location in Jávea so desirable for property investment?
faqs.answer: Portichol offers an exclusive hillside position with sea views, proximity to the famous Ambolo beach, and easy access to Jávea's amenities. The area is highly sought-after for its privacy, natural beauty, and strong rental demand from luxury travelers.

faqs.question: Can international buyers purchase this property and what is the buying process?
faqs.answer: Yes, international buyers can freely purchase Spanish property. The process involves making an offer, signing a private contract with deposit, conducting due diligence, and completing before a Spanish notary. We guide you through every step.

faqs.question: Is mortgage financing available for Villa MIR0160 purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, Spanish mortgages are available for both residents and non-residents, typically up to 70-80% of property value. We work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange competitive financing tailored to your situation.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this villa offer?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea's premium locations typically achieve 4-6% annual rental yields. The proximity to Ambolo beach and high-end finishes make this property particularly attractive for premium vacation rentals commanding higher weekly rates.

faqs.question: When will Villa MIR0160 be completed and ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: As a new build project by Miralbo Urbana S.L., completion timelines will be confirmed upon reservation. New construction typically takes 12-18 months, with exact completion dates provided in the purchase contract.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price of Villa MIR0160?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa with premium fixtures, modern kitchen appliances, bathroom fittings, interior lighting, and landscaped grounds. Specific inclusions will be detailed in the property specification document.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa MIR0160?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp, phone +34 634 044 970, or our website to arrange a viewing. We can organize site visits to show the location, review plans, and visit similar completed properties to demonstrate the quality standards.

faqs.question: Are there additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Yes, budget approximately 10-12% of purchase price for taxes, notary fees, registration costs, and legal fees. As a new build, you'll pay 10% VAT instead of transfer tax, and we'll provide a detailed breakdown of all costs.

faqs.question: What ongoing costs should I expect as an owner?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI), community fees if applicable, utilities, insurance, and maintenance. As a new build with modern systems and warranties, initial maintenance costs will be minimal compared to older properties.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0160 represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a luxury new build villa in one of Costa Blanca's most coveted locations. With its prime Portichol position, contemporary design, and proximity to the renowned Ambolo beach, this property offers the perfect blend of exclusivity, comfort, and investment potential. Don't miss your chance to own this piece of Mediterranean paradise – contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and take the first step towards luxury Costa Blanca living.
